section.title: Refreshing Multiple Repositories
section.para: Refresh a repository for its properties and virtual machines.

step.para:
Click
(Configuration), and then
(Refresh Relationships and Power States).

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: Identify a SmartProxy that has access to the repository to refresh it. For more information on Default Repository SmartProxy parameter, see CloudForms Management Engine Settings and Operations Guide.

note.para: If you are using more than one CloudForms Management Engine Appliance, be sure to set the Default Repository SmartProxy on all of the appliances.
